name: Half-Elf
description: Half-Elves are a blend of human versatility and elven grace. They are often seen as charismatic and adaptable, fitting into both human and elven societies but truly belonging to neither. Half-Elves inherit the best traits of both their parents, often possessing an innate charm, keen senses, and a love of freedom and adventure.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice.
special: Fey Ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic canâ€™t put you to sleep.
